title: Caged: New and Selected Poems
description: Emotionally charged, relevant, and moving... the poetry of Caged brings together real-life events, modern trends, and heartfelt responses to some of life's most beautiful and difficult moments. Inspired by life and love and made accessible by honesty, this collection journeys through this wonderful thing we call humanity.From the author of Where the Butterflies Go, Leap, Carry on Dancing, and Three Spaces comes a multi-faceted collection of new and selected poems accompanied by lyrical photography and popular quoto photos. Caged is the culmination of 25 years of work by best-selling author and poet, Heather Grace Stewart.Paperback: Black and white photography Hardback: full color photography
author: Heather Grace Stewart
